description:
What’s the point of bringing along your gadgets if you can’t use them on the water or in the rain? These flexible cases let you operate buttons and touchscreens to stay connected while keeping your equipment enclosed and protected.

  • Optical grade TPU panels let you use camera and screen
  • Touchscreen compatible, so you don’t have to expose your phone to the weather
  • Rugged, freezeproof, UV-resistant, crease-resistant PVC-free TPU
  • IPX8 waterproofing can be submerged to 10m for up to 1h, rain, snow, or paddling spray are no issue
  • RF welded seams add strength, without adding bulk
  • Dual lash points for hanging or securing to your gear
  • Both the Sea to Summit’s warranty and MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee cover this case itself. Neither guarantee covers the contents you put inside the case
name: Sea To Summit TPU Guide Waterproof Smartphone Case - Unisex
